Fraction
========

.. currentmodule:: codegrade.models.fraction

.. :py:class:: Fraction
   The JSON representation of a fraction.

   Inherits from :class:`fractions.Fraction`.

   .. :py:attribute:: numerator
      :type: int
      The numerator of the rational.

   .. :py:attribute:: denominator
      :type: int
      The denominator of the rational.
